text: @realDonaldTrump Who is enthusiastic about YOU? Over 110,000 dead from your impotent response to the coronavirus, a terrible middle class economy, and all the corruption!! We're enthusiastic thinking about voting Biden on Nov 3rd. Hire Santa,but you'll get no gifts.
